sources.title: Mickey (1948) Comedy, Drama Color Movie
sources.description:
Young girl is constantly getting into trouble and embarrassing her father, who finally puts his foot down.
 
Director: Ralph Murphy
Writers: Muriel Roy Bolton, Peggy Goodin 
Stars: Lois Butler, Bill Goodwin, Irene Hervey & Hattie McDaniel
Genres: Classics, Comedy, Drama
